title: PrivacyG
author: PrivacyG
created_time: February 18, 2023, 05:11:57 PMLast edit: March 15, 2023, 08:08:30 PM by PrivacyG
content: I am offering my avatar up for rent.  Any offer is welcomed and can be discussed and negotiated.Only accepting payments in Bitcoin.-----History :>Advertised Bitcoin Talk Pie Making Contest (25th of Feb to 14th of Mar)>NOW AVAILABLE!-Regards,PrivacyG

comments.author: GazetaBitcoin
comments.body: Hey there, PrivacyG!I don't know if you are aware, but there is an avatar campaign running right now (and which is still open for applications): [OPEN| AVATAR OPEN Reward $20/w] SINBAD MIXER Signature & Campaign. Up-to $130/W. By quickly browsing through the campaign pages I see that you were part of it a while ago. Now you left it, but I believe that you can still apply only for renting your avatar. As far as I see, they pay 20$ per week to those renting solely their avatars.Besides, there is also Betnomi's campaign, which also offers the possibility of renting only your avatar:  [FULL] Betnomi.com | Signature Campaign | Up to 0.0025 BTC/W. In this case, the payment is 0.001 BTC/week which, at current value of BTC, represents about 24$. However, this campaign is full at the moment but it won't hurt to keep watching it until a spot will be open again.I hope this helps.

comments.author: PrivacyG
comments.body: Thank you for the suggested services and effort.  I do know about Sinbad Avatar Campaign but I currently do not plan to join it.  I did not know about the Betnomi campaign, thank you for that one.  Will keep an eye wide open for opportunities.-Regards,PrivacyG

comments.author: PrivacyG
comments.body: Avatar & Personal Text have been rented for two weeks, starting from Today until 14th of March.If anyone is interested in renting the following weeks, feel free to make an offer in PM.-Regards,PrivacyG

comments.author: GazetaBitcoin
comments.created_time: February 25, 2023, 06:35:22 PMLast edit: March 03, 2023, 06:19:30 AM by GazetaBitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: PrivacyG on February 25, 2023, 02:07:13 PMAvatar & Personal Text have been rented for two weeksHehe, your new avatar suits you very well, PrivacyG! Same is available for your personal text  Seriously now, it is very nice and generous from you (I say that as I believe you are doing it either for free or for a minuscule compensation -- most likely for free) to promote the very nice contest organized by RickDeckard! I may be wrong, but I think you are the very first user promoting this contest through the avatar (and, so far, I only saw RickDeckard promoting it through his signature).Now seeing your support for the contest, I can't think anything else than inviting you to participate as well  come on, let's see your pie-baking skills! (Needless to say, the prizes are also very appealing!)
